property.name: insertPdbFileQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.pdb_file ( pdb_file_id, bio_data_item_id, gene_id, metadata ) VALUES ( :PDB_FILE_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :GENE_ID, :METADATA )

property.name: loadPdbFileQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.pretty_name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.owner,
t.pdb_file_id, t.bio_data_item_id, t.gene_id, t.metadata FROM catgenome.pdb_file t join catgenome.biological_data_item b ON t.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id WHERE t.pdb_file_id = ?

property.name: loadPdbFilesQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name name, b.pretty_name pretty_name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.owner,
t.pdb_file_id pdb_file_id, t.bio_data_item_id, t.gene_id gene_id, t.metadata FROM catgenome.pdb_file t join catgenome.biological_data_item b ON t.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id

property.name: updatePdbFileMetadataQuery
property.value: UPDATE catgenome.pdb_file SET metadata = :METADATA WHERE pdb_file_id = :PDB_FILE_ID

property.name: totalCountQuery
property.value: select count(*) as count from catgenome.pdb_file
